short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hex Color Code is a simple & user-friendly Hex Code generator for Chrome. No permissions needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hex Color Code is a useful little color picker. Get the hex code for every color you want. It's a simple tool without any browser permissions.
